ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's necessary and useful for future study. Yes I would recommend it to other graduate students.

Geophysical Fluid Dynamics will give you a great overview of how fluids work in a rotating system. It's a better course to take if you've already had another fluid dynamics class, as you'll benefit greatly by already being comfortable with the vocabulary and how fluids work in general. After this class, you'll understand why and when certain approximations are appropriate in oceanic and atmospheric systems, and you'll gain enough background to facilitate future study in rotating flows. I'd certainly recommend it to another student, but I'd warn students who haven't done a lot of geophysical flows (or fluids in general) that you may need to put in extra effort to keep up in the course - it's geared toward students who already have a general knowledge of how the oceans and atmosphere work.
Definitely recommend. The course provides a solid foundation of basic knowledge about geophysics. And it's very useful.
Yeah. GFD is the fundamental knowledge for those who are working on atmosphere and ocean sciences
I recommend, because students'd be able to explain geophysical fluid phenomena after taking this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helps me with my dynamic background.

This course significantly improved my ability to understand my discipline and increased my intuition and comfort with fluids in general. It's the most useful course I've had so far to directly relate my studies to my research.
This course provides a solidfoundation of basic knowledge about geophysics. And it's very useful in my research.
This course is very helpful to my research. I got deeper understanding and also learned about new topics from this course.
